metadata.title: CVE-2021-3638 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: ati-vga: inconsistent check in ati_2d_blt() may lead to out-of-bounds write

notes.note: mdeslaur> introduced in qemu 4.0 as of 2022-01-05, the proposed patch has not been committed into the upstream tree

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-05').
